bio.summary: Nghiêm Vũ Hoàng Long, also known as MCK, is a Rapper/ Singer-Songwriter based in Hanoi, Vietnam. bio.full: Nghiêm Vũ Hoàng Long, also known as MCK, is a Rapper/ Singer-Songwriter based in Hanoi, Vietnam. His music career started in early 2018 as an Independent Singer/ Songwriter under the alias Nger. His debut single was the smashing hit Tình Đắng Như Ly Cà Phê featuring Nân, accumulating over 30 Million Views since uploaded, kick-starting one of the most successful debuts in the local Independent scene. MCK's career took a turn in 2020 when he appeared as a contestant on the hit TV show Rap Việt and became one of the show's Finalists with fan-favorite songs such as Giàu Vì Bạn, Sang Vì Vợ; Dân Chơi Xóm; Va Vào Giai Điệu Này,... He has proven himself to be a force to be reckoned with in Vietnam's Hip-hop scene as one of the most prominent Independent Rapper. MCK further solidify his position in the industry by winning WeChoice Awards 2020's Most Promising Hip-hop Act.
